amendment.description: To amend the provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 regarding graduate medical schools located outside of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2374 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2374 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S9739-9741; text: CR S9740) To amend the provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 regarding graduate medical schools located outside of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2374 proposed by Senator Sessions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2374 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
